# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appInfos | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appInfos ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appInfos)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appInfos 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appInfos

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appInfos#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appInfos
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appInfos#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appInfos#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appInfos#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppAppInfosLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appappinfoslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appInfos#see-also)

### [Getting App Store details for your app](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appInfos#Getting-App-Store-details-for-your-app)

[`List All App Infos for an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-appinfos)Get information about an app that is currently live on App Store, or that goes live with the next version.[`List All App Store Versions for an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-appstoreversions)Get a list of all App Store versions of an app across all platforms.[`GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersions`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appstoreversions)[`Read the End User License Agreement Information of an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-enduserlicenseagreement)Get the custom end user license agreement (EULA) for a specific app and the territories where the agreement applies.[`GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/endUserLicenseAgreement`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-enduserlicenseagreement)[`List all custom product pages for an app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-appcustomproductpages)Get a list of all custom product pages for a specific app.[`Get all custom product page resource IDs for an app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appcustomproductpages)Get a list of custom product page resource IDs associated with an app.[`GET /v1/apps/{id}/appStoreVersionExperimentsV2`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-appstoreversionexperimentsv2)[`GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentsV2`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appstoreversionexperimentsv2)
